pose.Weight On Hip: standing with weight shifted to one hip, arms above head
pose.Legs Crossed Ankles: lying on back with legs raised and crossed at ankles
pose.Knees To Chest: sitting with knees pulled to chest, arms wrapped around shins
pose.Over Shoulder: turning back to camera, looking over shoulder
pose.Crouching Low: crouching low to ground on balls of feet
pose.Side Recline: reclining on side, supported by elbow
pose.Forward Bend: bending forward at waist, looking back through legs
pose.Hands Behind Neck: standing with hands clasped behind neck
pose.Twisted Sitting: sitting with legs folded, torso twisted to look behind
pose.Stomach Prone: lying on stomach with legs bent upward
pose.Leaning Back: leaning back against surface, one foot planted
pose.Cat Arch: on all fours with arched back like cat
pose.Wide V-Sit: sitting with legs spread wide in V-shape

pose.Arm Over Eyes: lying supine with arm draped over eyes
pose.Walking Away: walking away, hips swaying, looking back
pose.Hands On Hips: standing with hands on hips, elbows forward
